title: "Are We Ready for Artificial Empathy?"
excerpt: "Chatbot-delivered empathy can improve mood and create a strong working alliance between the user and AI interface. Large language AI models like ChatGPT can offer human-like validation and accurately infer meaning and feeling from a user's statements."
